string.name: back_to_map
string.translation_description: Button text to take user back to map view.

string.name: back_to_village
string.translation_description: Button text to take user back to the village.

string.name: go_to_play_store
string.translation_description: Prompt telling the user to upgrade the app

resources.string: This version of Santa Tracker is out of date. Please visit the Play Store to update to the latest version.

string.name: game_over
string.translation_description: Message shown at end of game

string.name: loading_screen
string.translation_description: Content description for a single image on the loading screen above a progress indicator.

string.name: menu_home
string.translation_description: Text for button to return to home screen

string.name: menu_share
string.translation_description: Share menu item. Will likely be high scores but could be others

string.name: error_fetch_module
string.translation_description: Error message shown when an error happens when downloading a game

resources.string: An error occurred while downloading %1$s. Is your network connection working?
